introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Shenzhen Zhama Future Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as \"we\") is committed to protecting your personal privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
introduction.content2: By using our services, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:

items.title: Personal Identity Information:
items.content: name, email address, phone number, etc.

items.title: Technical Information:
items.content: IP address, browser type, device information, access time, etc.

items.title: Usage Data:
items.content: how you use our services, including pages and features accessed

collection.usageIntro: We use the collected information for:
usageItems: Analyzing usage patterns to improve user experience

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers:
items.content: with trusted third parties who help us operate our business

items.title: Legal Requirements:
items.content: when required by law or to protect our rights

items.title: Business Transfers:
items.content: in the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, modification, or destruction. However, please note that no system is 100% secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
retention.content2: When your information is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you may have the following rights:
items: Access information we hold about you
Request deletion of your personal information
Object to processing of your information

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be notified to you via email or service notifications.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us through:
items: Address: Shenzhen Science and Technology Park, Nanshan District
contact.response: We will endeavor to respond to your inquiry within 30 days.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Welcome to the TeGo platform. By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service will be deemed acceptance of the modified terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: TeGo is an enterprise-level AI agent platform that provides the following services:
service.modification: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any services at any time without prior notice.

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: To use certain services, you need to create an account. You agree to:
promises: Provide accurate and complete registration information
Maintain the accuracy of account information
Protect the security of your account password
Take responsibility for all activities under your account
restrictionItems: Violate any applicable laws or regulations

conduct.title: User Conduct Guidelines
conduct.content: When using our services, you may not engage in the following activities:
prohibited: Infringe on others' intellectual property rights
Interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of services
Attempt unauthorized access to systems or data

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content in the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, interfaces, and code, is protected by intellectual property laws.
ip.userContent: You retain ownership of uploaded content but grant us a license to use, modify, and display such content.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided \"as is\" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the services will:
reasons: Be fully compatible with third-party services
Be completely secure or free from unauthorized access

changes.title: Terms Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified to you via email or service notifications. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the modified terms.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from the use of this service should be resolved through friendly consultation. If consultation fails, they should be submitted to a court with jurisdiction.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through the following methods:
methods: Address: Shenzhen Science and Technology Park, Nanshan District

aboutSection.title: Technical Highlights
aboutSection.subtitle: Using AI Technology to Redefine Enterprise Intelligence Infrastructure
aboutSection.description: TeGo platform is based on advanced AI technology stack, providing standardized and scalable AI agent service capabilities for enterprises

vision.title: Why Choose TeGo?
paragraphs: TeGo platform has successfully landed in multiple industries including healthcare, finance, and operations, supporting enterprises' complete closed-loop of "Validation-Iteration-Replication".
We provide high-performance, scalable, private deployment-supported full lifecycle AI solutions and technical services.

features.title: MCP AI Agent Protocol
features.description: Standardized service interfaces supporting automatic registration and composition of AI service components

features.title: RAG Retrieval Enhancement Capability
features.description: Realize intelligent Q&A combining context awareness with enterprise knowledge base

features.title: Multimodal AI Support
features.description: Access voice, image, text and other multimodal inputs, realizing continuous execution of complex tasks

features.title: Mainstream Large Model Support
features.description: Support OpenAI, Baidu ERNIE, Tongyi Qianwen, Gemini and other mainstream large models as well as privately deployed models

footer.suffix: , making AI the core competitiveness of every enterprise.

typingPhrases: Making AI the core competitiveness of every enterprise
Building truly comprehensive enterprise intelligence infrastructure spanning "Perception-Understanding-Execution"

featuresSection.title: Four Core Components
featuresSection.subtitle: TeGo Enterprise Agent Service Platform Architecture, providing complete agent operation and governance capabilities for enterprises

collection.title: TeGo-OS Enterprise Intelligent Operating System
collection.description: Multi-terminal agent access, covering recommendation, general, and industry-specific agent types. Unified user management, permission control, application market and token management. Provides core services like triggers, API integration, and plugin management.

analysis.title: TeGo-Engine Agent Development Platform
analysis.description: Visual drag-and-drop interface supporting process engine and node management. Channel management and data tracking for business process automation. Permission control and load balancing ensure enterprise-grade stable operation.

organization.title: TeGo-MCP Routing and Registry Center
organization.description: MCP service discovery and registration for dynamic routing of agent services. Agent management and conversation services supporting multi-agent collaboration. Vector indexing and retrieval augmentation (RAG) to enhance intelligent Q&A capabilities.

gateway.title: TeGo-LLM Model Gateway
gateway.description: Integrate mainstream large models like OpenAI, Gemini, QWen, DeepSeek. Load balancing, route distribution, flow control, and access security. Support local LLM model deployment with multimodal intelligent interaction capabilities.

taskManagement.title: Plugin-based Workspace
taskManagement.description: Support multi-role and multi-terminal access, unified management of plugins and applications, perfect support for tens of thousands of VSCode plugins, building efficient and customized development environment.

habitTracking.title: Process Engine and Data Bus
habitTracking.description: Realize business automation capabilities such as data tracking, task orchestration, and trigger logic, ensuring intelligent execution and monitoring of business processes.

financeManagement.title: TeGo-LLM Model Gateway
financeManagement.description: Integrate mainstream large models and local models, support semantic understanding, text-to-image, RAG and other intelligent interactions, providing powerful AI capability support.

framework.title: Self-developed MCP Framework
framework.description: The platform is based on a self-developed MCP framework, using @Tool decorators to quickly define agent tools.

standardization.title: Standardized Tool Registration
standardization.description: Not only supports automatic metadata declaration, but also implements structured and standardized registration of tool capabilities.

simplification.title: Simplified Development Process
simplification.description: Greatly simplifies the development process, achieving "define an invocable intelligent service with just a few lines of code".

codeExample.title: Decorator-Driven Development
codeExample.description: The project uses @Tool decorators to define tools, providing clear metadata declarations:

autoValidation.title: Auto Validation
autoValidation.description: Automatic parameter validation and type checking

summary.title: Core Advantages
summary.content: Through the decorator-driven development model, developers can focus on business logic implementation without worrying about tedious details such as tool registration, parameter validation, and type checking. This declarative development approach greatly improves development efficiency and code maintainability.

seo.title: Technical Features - TeGo MCP Platform
seo.description: TeGo MCP Platform technical features: self-developed MCP framework, decorator-driven development, standardized tool registration, simplified development process, significantly improving development efficiency.
seo.keywords: MCP Framework, Decorator-Driven, Tool Registration, TypeScript, Agent Development

openGraph.title: Technical Features - TeGo MCP Platform
openGraph.description: Decorator-driven development model that greatly simplifies agent tool development process.
